description.p: You move your hand in front of your eye and pretend to squish the target between your fingers slamming magical force into the creature and attempt to crush it. Make a Ranged Spell Attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes 10d6 Force Damage and half as much on a miss.
At Higher Levels. You may attempt to squish an additional target for each level higher this spell is cast as long as all targets are within 20ft of each other. Tee-Hee
